consultants.name: John Armstrong
consultants.title: Senior Vice President
consultants.description: John Armstrong has more than 35 years of experience in operations, finance, and general management. He has served in a variety of roles including executive management and advisor to corporate boards of directors, management, lenders, and investors. His specialties include developing and implementing new business models, working with finance and accounting teams to improve operations and reporting routines, liaising with creditors, lenders and private equity groups to source new financing.

consultants.name: Jennifer Sinclair
consultants.title: Media Marketing Manager
consultants.description: Jennifer Sinclair has more than 5 years of experience in operations, finance, and general management. He has served in a variety of roles including executive management and advisor to corporate boards of directors, management, lenders, and investors. His specialties include developing and implementing new business models, working with finance and accounting teams to improve operations and reporting routines, liaising with creditors, lenders and private equity groups to source new financing.
